alert.note: Alert for Finney; Gray; Hodgeman; Lane; Ness; Scott (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 8:25PM CDT until May 30 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Finney County in southwestern Kansas... Eastern Scott County in west central Kansas... Southwestern Ness County in west central Kansas... Northwestern Hodgeman County in southwestern Kansas... Lane County in west central Kansas... Northwestern Gray County in southwestern Kansas... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 825 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Pendennis to near Manning to near Holcomb, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Holcomb around 840 PM CDT. Garden City around 845 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Amy, Alamota, Beeler and Plymell. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Finney; Gray; Hodgeman; Lane; Ness; Scott
